page.title: 02RECREATION SOUTH OF BARRHEAD
page.content:
No formal provision exists for recreation in the immediate area but most of the several reservoirs are used by resident{ANGLING}clubs.{ { {CURLING}is popular in the area and is occasionally pursued on frozen dams in winter and more regularly at commercial venues which can be reached in 10 to 30 minutes by car.
A regular feature of the area is {MOTORCYCLE SCRAMBLING}and a part of Caldcoats farm contains a circuit which is used on a regular basis for organised competition and by a few for private practice.
The area also attracts}casual{WALKERS, {CYCLISTS, BIRD WATCHERS}etc. on a regular basis.
